Description

Escality is a XR development studio that creates highly customized and interactive VR/AR applications. Our mission is to use these mediums to give people new ways of experiencing the world.

History

At Escality, we believe in changing your perspective.
We want you to see a different world.
We dare you to escape reality.

We are a team of ambitious programmers, designers, artists, and creatives with the goal of producing greatly entertaining experiences using groundbreaking technologies like VR/AR.

Escality has helped create professional applications for Fortune 500 companies and small private clients alike. Previous clients include Intel, Dolby, Adidas, Facebook, and more.

Escality's first shipped title, Conjuror's Eye - a magical VR puzzle game, was released in March 2018 and is available on both SteamVR and Viveport.

With years of iterative development experience on consumer VR/AR equipment (HTC Vive, Oculus Rift, Windows MR, Microsoft Hololens) and development software (Unity, Unreal, Vuforia, OpenCV, ARKit, ARCore), as well as previous team members' work at Unity Technologies, Intel Corporation, and UCLA Research, Escality has the expertise to complete a wide variety of XR projects.

Escality is a proud recipient of the 2017 Kirk and Huifen Dunn Endowed Entrepreneurial Seed Funding Prize and was voted the Best Entrepreneurial Endeavor at UCLA ACM's Hacker Expo in 2018. Escality is also an alumni of the Startup UCLA Summer Accelerator Class of 2017.
